EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Chicago White Sox Baseball Game_Q315.Confirm - Sox Game
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed: Chicago White Sox vs. Boston Red Sox - August 24, 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
You are confirmed for the Chicago White Sox vs. Boston Red Sox game.
When: Monday, August 24th 6:00pm - Conference & Learning Center 7:10pm - Box #125 Rows 14-15
Where: U.S. Cellular Field 333 W 35th St Chicago, IL 60616
{{my.Chicago White Sox vs Boston Red Sox Game}}
We look forward to spending time with you at the upcoming Chicago White Sox vs. Boston Red Sox game!
Seating is limited for this private event. First Come, First Serve. We kindly ask that you do not send someone in your place.
See you there!
Questions? Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io> or 408 425 9302.
